description.value:
Badger’s Burrow
Caern Rite • Level 4

Time: 4 hours
Frequency: Once per Caern Turn
Cost: 6 Gnosis (may be shared by multiple Garou)
Requirement: Must be performed within a functioning Caern

Description
Badger’s Burrow attunes the Garou to disturbances within the Caern’s bounds. Rather than watching the entire Caern, this Rite focuses attention inward, sharpening awareness where it matters most. The land listens — and reports what it feels.

Effect
When the full Gnosis cost is invested, designate a Zone of Awareness centered on a point within the Caern. The size of the zone depends on the Caern’s Rating:

  • Rating 1: 60-foot radius

  • Rating 2: 120-foot radius

  • Rating 3: 300-foot radius

  • Rating 4: 1,000-foot radius

  • Rating 5: 1-mile radius

For the duration of the Caern Turn, Garou tending the Caern gain supernatural awareness of significant activity within the Zone of Awareness.

Benefits

  • The Storyteller alerts the Garou when:

    • Creatures enter or leave the zone

    • Hostile, stealthy, or clandestine activity occurs

    • Rituals, corruption, or supernatural influence is attempted

  • Garou have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks made to investigate events originating within the zone

  • Creatures attempting to hide, move unseen, or bypass notice within the zone do so at disadvantage

Limit
This awareness conveys presence and disturbance, not precise identity, location, or intent.

Limitations This Rite: Does not prevent entry into the Caern Grants no combat bonuses Does not bypass nondetection or similar effects The Zone of Awareness must remain entirely within the Caern Only one Zone of Awareness may be active at a time Performing this Rite again replaces the previous zone Corruption Interaction At Corruption 3 or higher, information may be delayed, muted, or unclear At Corruption 5, this Rite cannot be performed
